attributes.action: call a General Election as the population has no confidence in the current Members of Parliament due to their expense claims. We demand the opportunity to change our representation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There has been little movement from all the major parties over the latest scandal to rock Parliament. They all continue to claim money to fund second homes when ordinary people are struggling to keep their first homes. This is a vote of no confidence not only in the Government but all MP's and there should be an immediate call for a General election so we can decide who we want to govern our nation.

rejection.details:
There is already a petition calling for a general election which you may want to sign: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/GoToCountryNow/

If you wish to make a point about the MPs' expenses system, this is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
